entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Invermere
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 01 January 2023
